channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Navigating Proxy Servers with Ease: New Advancements in Docker Desktop 4.30
item.description: Docker Desktop 4.30 offers new proxy authentication enhancements, especially on the Windows front, to ensure seamless integration and interaction. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/navigating-proxy-servers-docker-desktop-4-30/

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.30: Proxy Support with SOCKS5, NTLM and Kerberos, ECI for Build Commands, Build View Features, and Docker Desktop on RHEL Beta
item.description: Read about new features in Docker Desktop 4.30, such as improved SOCKS5 proxy support, advanced integration with NTLM and Kerberos, and extended Enhanced Container Isolation to secure build environments. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-desktop-4-30/

item.title: Wasm vs. Docker: Performant, Secure, and Versatile Containers
item.description: Learn what WebAssembly is, why to use it, and how Docker and Wasm work together. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/wasm-vs-docker/

item.title: Creating AI-Enhanced Document Management with the GenAI Stack
item.description: We show how to integrate Alfresco, a robust document management system, with the GenAI Stack to open up document analysis, description, and classification possibilities. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/creating-ai-enhanced-document-management-with-the-genai-stack/
